title: Fran Tarkenton & Bud Grant!
description: First segment is Fran Tarkenton's bi-weekly chat with PA. The second segment is a surprise appearance by Bud Grant, and the two HOF'ers take over the radio.
itunes:summary: First segment is Fran Tarkenton's bi-weekly chat with PA. The second segment is a surprise appearance by Bud Grant, and the two HOF'ers take over the radio.
